availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Alexander Taylor (Christian County, Kentucky, resident)

body.p: Christian County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Son of Sidney Taylor. Married to Minerva Sloan Taylor in Montgomery County, Tennessee, on April 23, 1855. Resident of Christian County, Kentucky, in 1850.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Christian County, District 1, p. 468B.
"John A. Taylor (1836-1912)," Find A Grave, Memorial 104680447, accessed June 21, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/104680447.
"John Alexander Taylor," Courier-Journal (Louisville, KY), February 28, 1912, p. 7.
Tennessee State Marriages, 1780-2002, Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, TN, Montgomery County, 1838 - 1874: Marriages 3.
